title: Creating a Legend With Pre-Definedels
description: In data visualization, a legend is a key to interpreting the visual elements of a plot. It helps the viewer to understand the data and the meaning of the visual representation. Matplotlib is a popular Python library for creating data visualizations, including plots with legends. In this tutorial, we will learn how to create a legend with pre-defined labels in Matplotlib.

meta.title: Creating a Legend With Pre-Defined Labels
meta.description: Learn how to create a legend with pre-defined labels in Matplotlib, a popular Python data visualization library.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, python, legend, data visualization, data analysis
